DESCRIPTIONS.TRY_IT_OUT: Displays the Open API definition (Swagger) and allows for making test calls if the API is available.
DESCRIPTIONS.API_KEY:
When an API contract is created, the system generates a unique API Key.
This API Key is unique per application and the same for all contracts of this application.
All requests made to the API must include this API Key.
DESCRIPTIONS.API_ENDPOINT:
One important aspect of all APIs that are managed by the API Gateway is the security that the API Gateway provides.
The API can be accessed with this URL.
